join.description: Joins the voice channel you are currently in.

leave.description: Leaves the voice channel and emptys the queue.

play.description:
Plays the specified URL.
 If the bot fails to play from the link, the bot will search YouTube for results.
**Note: If playlist URLs are used, only the target song will be added to the playlist.**

pause.description: Pauses the song the bot is currently playing.

resume.description: Resumes the song if the song is paused.

skip.description: Skips the song the bot is currently playing and plays the next song in the queue.

nowplaying.description: Displays infomration about the current song.

help.description: Shows a list of all commands without arguments, and shows details about a specific command if one is passed.

shutdown.description:
Shuts down the bot. 
*Only to be used by the bot owner.*

wordle.description:
Plays a game of wordle.
If you want to know the rules: https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Wordle

about.description: Displays information about the bot, including special thanks & support information.

tictactoe.description: Plays a game that always draws with your friend.

remove.description: Deletes a specified song in the queue.

search.description: Searches YouTube and displays the first 5 results.

repeat.description:
Toggles the repeat mode between normal, single loop and queue loop.
If no parameters are passed, the bot will display the current repeat mode.
